org.gearvrf.animation

Class GVRScaleAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.animation.GVRAnimation
      • org.gearvrf.animation.GVRTransformAnimation
        • org.gearvrf.animation.GVRScaleAnimation

  • public class GVRScaleAnimation
extends GVRTransformAnimation
    Size animation.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.gearvrf.animation.GVRAnimation

        DEFAULT_REPEAT_COUNT

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRScaleAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration, float scale)
      Scale the transform, by the same amount in each dimension.
      GVRScaleAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration, float scaleX, float scaleY, float scaleZ)
      Scale the transform, by potentially different amounts in each dimension.

      Scale the transform, by the same amount in each dimension.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GVRScaleAnimation

        public GVRScaleAnimation(GVRTransform target,
                         float duration,
                         float scaleX,
                         float scaleY,
                         float scaleZ)
        Scale the transform, by potentially different amounts in each dimension. Note that the scale parameters are the target scale, not a multiplier applied to the current scale. For example, if getScaleX() returns 4, animating to 2 will shrink the object, not grow it.
        Parameters:
        target - GVRTransform to animate.
        duration - The animation duration, in seconds.
        scaleX - Target x scale
        scaleY - Target y scale
        scaleZ - Target z scale

      • GVRScaleAnimation

        public GVRScaleAnimation(GVRTransform target,
                         float duration,
                         float scale)
        Scale the transform, by the same amount in each dimension. Note that the scale parameter is the target scale, not a multiplier applied to the current scale. For example, if getScaleX() returns 4, animating to 2 will shrink the object, not grow it.
        Parameters:
        target - GVRTransform to animate.
        duration - The animation duration, in seconds.
        scale - Target scale

      • GVRScaleAnimation

        public GVRScaleAnimation(GVRSceneObject target,
                         float duration,
                         float scaleX,
                         float scaleY,
                         float scaleZ)
        Scale the transform, by potentially different amounts in each dimension. Note that the scale parameters are the target scale, not a multiplier applied to the current scale. For example, if getScaleX() returns 4, animating to 2 will shrink the object, not grow it.
        Parameters:
        target - GVRSceneObject containing a GVRTransform
        duration - The animation duration, in seconds.
        scaleX - Target x scale
        scaleY - Target y scale
        scaleZ - Target z scale

      • GVRScaleAnimation

        public GVRScaleAnimation(GVRSceneObject target,
                         float duration,
                         float scale)
        Scale the transform, by the same amount in each dimension. Note that the scale parameter is the target scale, not a multiplier applied to the current scale. For example, if getScaleX() returns 4, animating to 2 will shrink the object, not grow it.
        Parameters:
        target - GVRSceneObject containing a GVRTransform
        duration - The animation duration, in seconds.
        scale - Target scale
